data.meta_description: Where is Sana'a, Yemen on map with latitude and longitude gps coordinates are given in both decimal degrees and DMS format, see where Sana'a, Yemen is located on the map.
data.text:
Sana'a, Yemen

Latitude and longitude coordinates are: 15.369445, 44.191006.

Sana'a (صنعاء‎) is one of the largest cities of Yemen and the capital of the same name governorate. Located very high in the mountains (at an elevation of about 7,500 ft), the city is known as one of the oldest continuously inhabited settlements and one of the highest capital cities in the world. It is an important tourist destination, with many historic buildings, mosques, parks, fountains, monuments, and other points of interest. The Old City of Sanaʽa is on the list of UNESCO World Heritage Site. Historical landmarks and attractions in the city include The Al Saleh Mosque, the al-Mahdi Mosque, Bab Al-Yemen, Revolution Park, National Museum, Dar al-Hajar, Attabari Elementary School, Tower houses, Old Sana'a City's Wall, and Al Sabeen Park. There are also several public and private universities in the city like Sana'a University, Lebanese International University, and Emirates International University.
